store_view.tmobile_en_us: <style> :root {--color-primary: #222;--color-on-primary: #fff;--color-accent: #ea0a8e;--color-on-accent: #fff;}.page-header .panel.wrapper, .copyright {background: var(--color-primary) !important;color: var(--color-on-primary) !important;}@media (min-width: 768px) {.section-item-content.nav-sections-item-content {background-color: var(--color-accent);color: var(--color-on-accent);}.navigation {background: inherit !important;}.navigation .level0 > .level-top {color: inherit !important;}.navigation .level0.active > .level-top, .navigation .level0.has-active > .level-top {border-color: var(--color-on-accent) !important;}}</style>
